casebody.data:
STATE of North Carolina
v.
William Edward GODWIN, III No. 167PA16 Supreme Court of North Carolina. September 22, 2016 M. Gordon Widenhouse, Jr., Attorney at Law, Chapel Hill, For Godwin, William Edward (III). Teresa L. Townsend, Assistant Attorney General, Kristin Jo Uicker, Assistant Attorney General, R. Andrew Murray, District Attorney, For State of North Carolina.

ORDER

Upon consideration of the conditional petition filed on the 23rd of May 2016 by Defendant in this matter for discretionary review of the decision of the North Carolina Court of Appeals pursuant to G.S. 7A-31, the following order was entered and is hereby certified to the North Carolina Court of Appeals:

"Allowed by order of the Court in conference, this the 22nd of September 2016."

Therefore the case is docketed as of the date of this order's certification. Briefs of the respective parties shall be submitted to this Court within the times allowed and in the manner provided by Appellate Rule 15(g)(2).
